name: tnym-js
description: Automated tool to spam users on Tellonym

scripts.build: (if exist build rmdir /s /q build) && mkdir build && npm run install_externals && webpack --config webpack.main.js --mode production && webpack --config webpack.renderer.js --mode production && npm run build_dist
scripts.build_dist: (if exist build_dist rmdir /s /q build_dist) && mkdir build_dist && xcopy /e /y /f build build_dist\build\ && copy package.json build_dist
scripts.dist: npm run build && electron-packager ./build_dist Tnym-js --out dist/ --overwrite --extra-resource="drivers" --asar --arch "x64, ia32" --platform=win32 --icon assets/icon.ico
scripts.dev: (gulp --gulpfile ./semantic/gulpfile.js build) && npm run install_externals && npm run watch

author: FedeIlLeone
